channel.title: Adding royal to serv (royal shirt prob)
channel.description:
so i added full royal to my client but when i put on the shirt , the arms are invisble , any solutions?
greetz forz4

item.title: Adding royal to serv (royal shirt prob)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

this is a model question… your supposed to ask in model help section… but its probably added as a weapon… not a body… so however you change that on your server (NOT CLIENT) do that. i cant tell you how because you didnt list anything about your server or client (should have). but good luck
